articles.author: Wesley Yin-Poole
articles.title: Someone Complained to Ad Standards That a Diablo 4 Billboard Reminded Them of the ‘Hell’ of Lockdown - IGN
articles.description: Advertising standards officials have dismissed a complaint about a Diablo 4 “Welcome to Hell” billboard displayed in Melbourne, Australia.
articles.content:
Advertising standards officials have dismissed a complaint about a Diablo 4 Welcome to Hell billboard displayed in Melbourne.
The unnamed complainant contacted the Australian Ad Standards Community … [+2840 chars]
